20110116163157.000|20110116163158.000|CC1|I AM OF HER BECAUSE SHE IS RIGHT

20110116163214.000|20110116163218.000|CC1|STRUGGLE, WHICH SHE WILL        
20110116163218.000|20110116163219.000|CC1|OVERCOME, SHE IS SHOWING RAW

20110116163219.000|20110116163220.000|CC1|THAT WE CAN ALL GET BEHIND.

20110116163222.000|20110116163222.000|CC1|>> Schieffer: IT'S MY           
20110116163222.000|20110116163225.000|CC1|UNDERSTANDING THEY HAVE TAKEN

20110116163445.000|20110116163445.000|XDS|%    TITLE:   
20110116163442.000|20110116163445.000|CC1|THING HAPPENED, IN THE HOURS... 
20110116163445.000|20110116163446.000|CC1|FIRST HOURS AFTER IT, IT SEEMED 
20110116163446.000|20110116163446.000|CC1|LIKE IT MIGHT DRIVE US FURTHER

20110116163450.000|20110116163451.000|CC1|>> YOU KNOW, IT IS A VERY       
20110116163451.000|20110116163451.000|CC1|INTERESTING DIFFERENCE.         
20110116163451.000|20110116163453.000|CC1|IN THE FIRST MOMENTS AFTER THIS,

20110116163454.000|20110116163455.000|CC1|BOTH SIDES.                     
20110116163455.000|20110116163500.000|CC1|LEFT WINGERS TRYING TO BLAME IT 
20110116163500.000|20110116163501.000|CC1|ON RIGHT WING, TEA PARTY, SARAH 
20110116163501.000|20110116163502.000|CC1|PALIN.                          
20110116163502.000|20110116163504.000|CC1|RIGHT WINGERS TRYING TO FIGHT   
20110116163504.000|20110116163505.000|CC1|BACK AND DEFEND THEMSELVES      
20110116163505.000|20110116163507.000|CC1|AGAINST WHAT WAS REALLY AN      
20110116163507.000|20110116163509.000|CC1|OUTRAGEOUS CHARGE.              
20110116163509.000|20110116163511.000|CC1|BUT THE REALITY IS THAT THAT    
20110116163511.000|20110116163511.000|CC1|SETTLED PRETTY QUICKLY WHEN WE  
20110116163511.000|20110116163514.000|CC1|LEARNED THE HISTORY.            
20110116163514.000|20110116163515.000|CC1|AND I THOUGHT THE PRESIDENT'S   
20110116163515.000|20110116163515.000|CC1|SPEECH PUT IT ON A DIFFERENT    
20110116163515.000|20110116163519.000|CC1|TONE.                           
20110116163519.000|20110116163520.000|CC1|I THINK WE HAVE A CHANCE, EVEN  
20110116163520.000|20110116163521.000|CC1|THOUGH A COUPLE OF DAYS LATER, I
20110116163521.000|20110116163522.000|CC1|THINK WE HAVE A CHANCE TO DO THE
20110116163522.000|20110116163523.000|CC1|SAME THING THAT WE DID AFTER    
20110116163523.000|20110116163526.000|CC1|SEPTEMBER 11.                   
20110116163526.000|20110116163527.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, IT MOVED ME GREATLY   
20110116163527.000|20110116163529.000|CC1|THAT CHRISTINA GREENE WAS BORN  
20110116163529.000|20110116163531.000|CC1|ON SEPTEMBER 11.                
20110116163531.000|20110116163536.000|CC1|I FEEL A PERSONAL CONNECTION TO 
20110116163536.000|20110116163539.000|CC1|HER-- HER GRANDDAD WAS A MANAGER
20110116163539.000|20110116163539.000|CC1|OF THE METS AND THE YANKEES, AS 
20110116163539.000|20110116163541.000|CC1|WELL.                           
20110116163541.000|20110116163542.000|CC1|AND THIS YOUNG LADY WAS VERY    
20110116163542.000|20110116163542.000|CC1|TAKEN BY THE FACT THAT SHE WAS  
20110116163542.000|20110116163546.000|CC1|BORN ON SEPTEMBER 11.           
20110116163546.000|20110116163547.000|CC1|SO MAYBE NOW, WE CAN LEARN      
20110116163547.000|20110116163548.000|CC1|THINGS FROM IT.                 
20110116163548.000|20110116163549.000|CC1|I THINK THERE'S A REAL          
20110116163549.000|20110116163549.000|CC1|OPPORTUNITY TO TRY TO HAVE MORE 
20110116163549.000|20110116163551.000|CC1|CIVIL DISCOURSE.                
20110116163551.000|20110116163552.000|CC1|ALTHOUGH THE LACK OF CIVIL      
20110116163552.000|20110116163554.000|CC1|DISCOURSE WASN'T THE CAUSE OF   
20110116163554.000|20110116163556.000|CC1|THIS, AS SOME PEOPLE THOUGHT.   
20110116163556.000|20110116163557.000|CC1|THE BENEFITS WE CAN GET FROM    
20110116163557.000|20110116163559.000|CC1|CIVIL DISCOURSE WILL ALLOW US TO
20110116163559.000|20110116163600.000|CC1|SOLVE A PROBLEM LIKE THIS, WHICH
20110116163600.000|20110116163602.000|CC1|I BELIEVE, IF WE WANT TO BE     
20110116163602.000|20110116163603.000|CC1|PERFECTLY LOGICAL ABOUT IT, THE 
20110116163603.000|20110116163605.000|CC1|PROBLEM THAT HELPED TO CAUSE    
20110116163605.000|20110116163607.000|CC1|THIS IS OUR INABILITY TO DEAL   
20110116163607.000|20110116163608.000|CC1|WITH MENTAL ILLNESS AND OUR     
20110116163608.000|20110116163609.000|CC1|INABILITY TO DEAL WITH IT AS A  
20110116163609.000|20110116163611.000|CC1|SOCIETY.                        
20110116163611.000|20110116163615.000|CC1|WE ALWAYS HAVE THESE PROBLEMS.  
20110116163615.000|20110116163615.000|CC1|WE HAVE A SET OF RIGHTS IN THIS 
20110116163615.000|20110116163616.000|CC1|COUNTRY, VERY IMPORTANT.        
20110116163616.000|20110116163617.000|CC1|THEN WE HAVE A SET OF PROBLEMS. 
20110116163617.000|20110116163619.000|CC1|HOW YOU BALANCE THEM.           
20110116163619.000|20110116163619.000|CC1|ADDRESSING THOSE PROBLEMS       
20110116163619.000|20110116163622.000|CC1|AGAINST THE RIGHTS WE HAVE.     
20110116163622.000|20110116163623.000|CC1|WE HAVE TO MAKE THAT ADJUSTMENT,
20110116163623.000|20110116163623.000|CC1|AS ED RENDELL KNOWS.            
20110116163623.000|20110116163625.000|CC1|HE'S A BIG PART OF IT.          
20110116163625.000|20110116163626.000|CC1|WE HAD TO MAKE THAT ADJUSTMENT  
20110116163626.000|20110116163627.000|CC1|TO MAKE CITIES SAFER.           
20110116163627.000|20110116163629.000|CC1|MAYBE WE HAVE TO MAKE THAT      
20110116163629.000|20110116163630.000|CC1|ADJUSTMENT NOW TO DEAL WITH     
20110116163630.000|20110116163633.000|CC1|MENTAL ILLNESS.                 
20110116163633.000|20110116163635.000|CC1|THIS MAN WAS CRYING OUT FOR     
20110116163635.000|20110116163636.000|CC1|SOMEONE WHO NEEDED TO BE        
20110116163636.000|20110116163637.000|CC1|TREATED.                        
20110116163637.000|20110116163640.000|CC1|HE WAS BEING TOLD TO BE TREATED.
20110116163640.000|20110116163640.000|CC1|PEOPLE WERE SAYING HE WAS       
20110116163640.000|20110116163641.000|CC1|BIZARRE.                        
20110116163641.000|20110116163642.000|CC1|PEOPLE WERE SAYING HE WAS       
20110116163642.000|20110116163643.000|CC1|FRIGHTENING.                    
20110116163643.000|20110116163645.000|CC1|A TEACHER WOULDN'T BE WITH HIM  
20110116163645.000|20110116163648.000|CC1|WITHOUT A GUARD BEING THERE.    
20110116163648.000|20110116163651.000|CC1|GOSH, YOU WOULD THINK, AT SOME  
20110116163651.000|20110116163651.000|CC1|POINT ALONG THE WAY, HE'D HAVE  
20110116163651.000|20110116163652.000|CC1|BEEN EVALUATED.                 
20110116163652.000|20110116163653.000|CC1|IT ISN'T AN ISOLATED INCIDENT.  
20110116163653.000|20110116163654.000|CC1|WE COULD GO BACK AND LOOK AT    
20110116163654.000|20110116163655.000|CC1|LOTS OF INCIDENTS LIKE THIS     
20110116163655.000|20110116163656.000|CC1|WHERE PEOPLE WEREN'T BEING      
20110116163656.000|20110116163659.000|CC1|TREATED.                        
20110116163659.000|20110116163701.000|CC1|SENATOR GILLIBRAND'S            
20110116163701.000|20110116163706.000|CC1|PREDECESSOR, SENATOR MOYNIHAN IS
20110116163706.000|20110116163707.000|CC1|THE ONE WHO EXPLAINED THIS TO ME
20110116163707.000|20110116163708.000|CC1|WHEN I WAS MAYOR.               
20110116163708.000|20110116163710.000|CC1|HE USED TO SAY IN THE '60s THEY 
20110116163710.000|20110116163720.000|CC1|LET EVERYONE OUT OF THE "INSANE 
20110116163720.000|20110116163721.000|CC1|ASYLUMS," HE CALLED THEM.       
20110116163721.000|20110116163722.000|CC1|HE SAID THAT WAS A GOOD THING   
20110116163722.000|20110116163723.000|CC1|BECAUSE A LOT OF THEM DIDN'T    
20110116163723.000|20110116163724.000|CC1|BELONG THERE, BUT THERE WAS     
20110116163724.000|20110116163726.000|CC1|SUPPOSED TO BE A FOLLOW UP WHICH
20110116163726.000|20110116163729.000|CC1|WAS TREATMENT IN THE COMMUNITY--
20110116163729.000|20110116163730.000|CC1|MONITORING, MEDICINE.           
20110116163730.000|20110116163731.000|CC1|THAT FOLLOW UP HAS NEVER TAKEN  
20110116163731.000|20110116163733.000|CC1|PLACE.                          
20110116163733.000|20110116163733.000|CC1|WELL, MAYBE THAT FOLLOW UP IS   
20110116163733.000|20110116163734.000|CC1|NEEDED NOW.                     
20110116163734.000|20110116163735.000|CC1|THAT WOULD PROBABLY BE THE MOST 
20110116163735.000|20110116163736.000|CC1|RELEVANT RESPONSE TO THIS       
20110116163736.000|20110116163736.000|CC1|TRAGEDY THAT ALMOST TOOK THE    
20110116163736.000|20110116163738.000|CC1|LIFE OF A REALLY FINE           
20110116163738.000|20110116163740.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN, WHO CAN HAVE A   
20110116163740.000|20110116163741.000|CC1|GREAT FUTURE, AND DID TAKE SOME 
20110116163741.000|20110116163741.000|CC1|LIVES INCLUDING A VERY YOUNG    
20110116163741.000|20110116163742.000|CC1|ONE.                            
20110116163742.000|20110116163743.000|CC1|>> Schieffer: WHEN YOU WERE THE 
20110116163743.000|20110116163744.000|CC1|MAYOR, YOU WERE PRETTY STRONG ON
20110116163744.000|20110116163744.000|CC1|CONTROL, FOR EXAMPLE, OF        
20110116163744.000|20110116163745.000|CC1|HANDGUNS.                       
20110116163745.000|20110116163746.000|CC1|DO YOU THINK IT IS TIME TO      
20110116163746.000|20110116163748.000|CC1|REEXAMINE THE GUN LAWS?         
20110116163748.000|20110116163749.000|CC1|WE'RE NOT TALKING ABOUT TAKING  
20110116163749.000|20110116163752.000|CC1|PEOPLE'S GUNS AWAY FROM THEM.   
20110116163752.000|20110116163753.000|CC1|PEOPLE WHO ARE QUALIFIED TO HAVE
20110116163753.000|20110116163755.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20110116163755.000|20110116163757.000|CC1|BUT IS THERE A NEED TO FIND SOME
20110116163757.000|20110116163759.000|CC1|WAY TO KEEP GUNS OUT OF THE     
20110116163759.000|20110116163759.000|CC1|HANDS OF PEOPLE LIKE MR.        
20110116163759.000|20110116163803.000|CC1|LOUGHNER?                       
20110116163803.000|20110116163804.000|CC1|>> WELL, I MEAN, IT WOULD SEEM  
20110116163804.000|20110116163807.000|CC1|TO ME THAT YOU'D ADDRESS THIS   
20110116163807.000|20110116163809.000|CC1|WITH THE MOST RELEVANT PROBLEM  
20110116163809.000|20110116163810.000|CC1|FIRST.                          
20110116163810.000|20110116163811.000|CC1|THE MOST RELEVANT PROBLEM WAS   
20110116163811.000|20110116163813.000|CC1|THE LACK OF AN ABILITY TO DEAL  
20110116163813.000|20110116163816.000|CC1|WITH WHAT WAS APPARENTLY        
20110116163816.000|20110116163816.000|CC1|PARANOID SCHIZOPHRENIA THAT     
20110116163816.000|20110116163820.000|CC1|SHOULD HAVE BEEN TREATED.       
20110116163820.000|20110116163824.000|CC1|THEN, I WOULD REESTABLISH A     
20110116163824.000|20110116163830.000|CC1|SITUATION OF CIVILITY, WHICH    
20110116163830.000|20110116163830.000|CC1|WE SEEM TO BE DOING, SO WE CAN  
20110116163830.000|20110116163831.000|CC1|TALK TO EACH OTHER ABOUT GUN    
20110116163831.000|20110116163832.000|CC1|LAWS WITHOUT YELLING AT EACH    
20110116163832.000|20110116163832.000|CC1|OTHER.                          
20110116163832.000|20110116163833.000|CC1|WE DO THOSE FIRST TWO THINGS I  
20110116163833.000|20110116163834.000|CC1|THINK WE COULD TAKE A LOOK AT   
20110116163834.000|20110116163835.000|CC1|GUN LAWS AND SEE WHAT CAN BE    
20110116163835.000|20110116163836.000|CC1|DONE THAT DOESN'T AFFECT THE    
20110116163836.000|20110116163838.000|CC1|CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS THAT      
20110116163838.000|20110116163838.000|CC1|PEOPLE HAVE TO HAVE GUNS, THE   
20110116163838.000|20110116163839.000|CC1|RIGHT THEY HAVE TO PROTECT      
20110116163839.000|20110116163840.000|CC1|THEMSELVES.                     
20110116163840.000|20110116163841.000|CC1|THERE ARE PEOPLE THAT WOULD     
20110116163841.000|20110116163845.000|CC1|ARGUE THAT IF MORE PEOPLE HAD   
20110116163845.000|20110116163846.000|CC1|GUNS, THIS MAY NOT HAVE         
20110116163846.000|20110116163847.000|CC1|HAPPENED, BECAUSE SOMEBODY MIGHT
20110116163847.000|20110116163849.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN ABLE TO TAKE ACTION   
20110116163849.000|20110116163851.000|CC1|IMMEDIATELY AND STOP HIM BEFORE 
20110116163851.000|20110116163852.000|CC1|HE INFLICTED EITHER DAMAGE OR AS
20110116163852.000|20110116163853.000|CC1|MUCH DAMAGE AS HE DID.          
20110116163853.000|20110116163853.000|CC1|WE'VE GOT A VERY STRONG DEBATE  
20110116163853.000|20110116163855.000|CC1|ON GUNS.                        
20110116163855.000|20110116163857.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO NEED A LEVEL OF  
20110116163857.000|20110116163858.000|CC1|CIVILITY TO DISCUSS IT THAT     
20110116163858.000|20110116163900.000|CC1|LEADS TO RATIONALITY.           
20110116163900.000|20110116163902.000|CC1|I THINK WE SHOULD ALSO DISCUSS  
20110116163902.000|20110116163906.000|CC1|IMMIGRATION.                    
20110116163906.000|20110116163907.000|CC1|IF WE COULD GET OUR SELVES TO   
20110116163907.000|20110116163907.000|CC1|THE POINT OF NOT DEMONIZING EACH
20110116163907.000|20110116163908.000|CC1|OTHER OVER IT.                  
20110116163908.000|20110116163910.000|CC1|BUT I THINK THE CRITICAL THING  
20110116163910.000|20110116163910.000|CC1|IS LET'S SEE IF WE CAN ACT      
20110116163910.000|20110116163913.000|CC1|RATIONALLY AND ON POINT.        
20110116163913.000|20110116163915.000|CC1|MOST IMPORTANT THING THAT WOULD 
20110116163915.000|20110116163917.000|CC1|HAVE PREVENTED THIS IS IF THIS  
20110116163917.000|20110116163919.000|CC1|LOUGHNER HAD BEEN IDENTIFIED AS 
20110116163919.000|20110116163921.000|CC1|WHAT HE CLEARLY WAS.            
20110116163921.000|20110116163922.000|CC1|THERE'S SOMETHING WRONG IN A    
20110116163922.000|20110116163923.000|CC1|SOCIETY WHERE WE HAVE SO MANY OF
20110116163923.000|20110116163926.000|CC1|THESE SITUATIONS.               
20110116163926.000|20110116163927.000|CC1|WE HAD THE MAJOR NIDAL A YEAR-  
20110116163927.000|20110116163932.000|CC1|AND-A-HALF AGO.                 
20110116163932.000|20110116163933.000|CC1|MAJOR NIDAL, FOR THREE YEARS, IN
20110116163933.000|20110116163934.000|CC1|THE ARMY WAS INDICATING A DESIRE
20110116163934.000|20110116163936.000|CC1|TO PARTICIPATE IN JIHAD.        
20110116163936.000|20110116163939.000|CC1|AND WE PROMOTED HIM.            
20110116163939.000|20110116163940.000|CC1|I MEAN, WE'RE MAKING A BIG      
20110116163940.000|20110116163942.000|CC1|MISTAKE HERE NOT CHANGING OUR   
20110116163942.000|20110116163945.000|CC1|PROCEDURES WITH REGARD TO MENTAL
20110116163945.000|20110116163947.000|CC1|ILLNESS, AND THEN SOME FORM OF  
20110116163947.000|20110116163950.000|CC1|INVOLUNTARY APPRAISAL OF PEOPLE 
20110116163950.000|20110116163952.000|CC1|WHO DISPLAY SITUATIONS WHERE    
20110116163952.000|20110116163953.000|CC1|TEACHERS HAVE TO HAVE GUARDS    
20110116163953.000|20110116163954.000|CC1|THERE TO PROTECT THEMSELVES.    
20110116163954.000|20110116163956.000|CC1|>> Schieffer: MR. MAYOR, WHAT   
20110116163956.000|20110116163958.000|CC1|WAS YOUR REACTION TO THE WAY    
20110116163958.000|20110116163958.000|CC1|THAT SARAH PALIN REACTED TO ALL 
20110116163958.000|20110116164002.000|CC1|OF THIS?                        
20110116164002.000|20110116164005.000|CC1|>> MY REACTION... WHAT SARAH    
20110116164005.000|20110116164007.000|CC1|PALIN DID WAS SOMEBODY WHO WAS  
20110116164007.000|20110116164010.000|CC1|PROBABLY UPSET AND MAYBE EVEN   
20110116164010.000|20110116164012.000|CC1|SHAKEN BY THE FACT THAT SHE WAS,
20110116164012.000|20110116164013.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, NOT ACCUSED OF MURDER,
20110116164013.000|20110116164014.000|CC1|BUT ACCUSED OF PLAYING A        
20110116164014.000|20110116164016.000|CC1|MATERIAL ROLE IN THIS INCIDENT  
20110116164016.000|20110116164018.000|CC1|IN A VERY, VERY DIRECT WAY.     
20110116164018.000|20110116164020.000|CC1|WHEN IN FACT THE FACTS AND THE  
20110116164020.000|20110116164022.000|CC1|CIRCUMSTANCES SHOW THAT THIS HAD
20110116164022.000|20110116164023.000|CC1|NOTHING TO DO WITH THE LEFT OR  
20110116164023.000|20110116164025.000|CC1|THE RIGHT.                      
20110116164025.000|20110116164027.000|CC1|IT HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH ANY   
20110116164027.000|20110116164033.000|CC1|MAP THAT SARAH PALIN HAD OR...  
20110116164033.000|20110116164034.000|CC1|THIS WAS CLEARLY... AND I'VE    
20110116164034.000|20110116164035.000|CC1|DEALT WITH ENOUGH MURDER CASES  
20110116164035.000|20110116164036.000|CC1|AND INSANITY DEFENSES ENOUGH TO 
20110116164036.000|20110116164037.000|CC1|KNOW-- THAT THIS IS ONE OF THOSE
20110116164037.000|20110116164038.000|CC1|THAT COMES OUT OF THE STRANGE,  
20110116164038.000|20110116164041.000|CC1|WEIRD, BIZARRE BACKGROUND OF    
20110116164041.000|20110116164045.000|CC1|THIS YOUNG MAN.                 
20110116164045.000|20110116164048.000|CC1|YEAH, SHE USED THE WRONG WORD IN
20110116164048.000|20110116164049.000|CC1|RESPONDING TO IT, BUT I CAN SEE 
20110116164049.000|20110116164051.000|CC1|WHY SHE WOULD FEEL VERY UPSET.  
20110116164051.000|20110116164052.000|CC1|>> Schieffer: OUR TIME IS       
20110116164052.000|20110116164053.000|CC1|LIMITED.                        
20110116164053.000|20110116164057.000|CC1|LET ME JUST ASK YOU QUICKLY.    
20110116164057.000|20110116164057.000|CC1|ARE YOU RETHINKING... ARE YOU   
20110116164057.000|20110116164058.000|CC1|THINKING ABOUT MAYBE RUNNING FOR
20110116164058.000|20110116164100.000|CC1|PRESIDENT AGAIN?                
20110116164100.000|20110116164101.000|CC1|>> NOT THIS MORNING.            
20110116164101.000|20110116164103.000|CC1|I HAVE THOUGHT ABOUT IT IN      
20110116164103.000|20110116164104.000|CC1|RECENT WEEKS, BUT I HAVEN'T     
20110116164104.000|20110116164105.000|CC1|THOUGHT ABOUT IT.               
20110116164105.000|20110116164107.000|CC1|MY HEART GOES OUT TO THE        
20110116164107.000|20110116164108.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN AND HER FAMILY AND
20110116164108.000|20110116164110.000|CC1|ALL OF THE PEOPLE THAT LOST     
20110116164110.000|20110116164114.000|CC1|LOVED ONES AND THE PEOPLE OF    
20110116164114.000|20110116164114.000|CC1|ARIZONA, AND PARTICULARLY, THE  
20110116164114.000|20110116164115.000|CC1|GREENE FAMILY.                  
20110116164115.000|20110116164116.000|CC1|WHAT A WONDERFUL YOUNG GIRL.    
20110116164116.000|20110116164119.000|CC1|WHAT AN IRONY SHE WAS BORN ON A 
20110116164119.000|20110116164120.000|CC1|TERRIBLE DAY FOR OUR COUNTRY AND
20110116164120.000|20110116164121.000|CC1|SHE DIED ON A TERRIBLE DAY FOR  
20110116164121.000|20110116164122.000|CC1|OUR COUNTRY.                    
20110116164122.000|20110116164124.000|CC1|>> Schieffer: THANK YOU SO MUCH,
20110116164124.000|20110116164125.000|CC1|MR. MAYOR, FOR JOINING US THIS  
20110116164125.000|20110116164126.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110116164126.000|20110116164128.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU, BOB.              
20110116164128.000|20110116164128.000|CC1|>> Schieffer: I WANT TO GO TO   
20110116164128.000|20110116164130.000|CC1|GOVERNOR RENDELL IN             
20110116164130.000|20110116164131.000|CC1|PHILADELPHIA.                   
20110116164131.000|20110116164134.000|CC1|YOU HEARD RUDY GIULIANI.        
20110116164134.000|20110116164137.000|CC1|HE SAID WE NEED TO ESTABLISH A  
20110116164137.000|20110116164138.000|CC1|MORE CIVIL DISCOURSE, AND THEN  
20110116164138.000|20110116164139.000|CC1|PERHAPS WE CAN TALK ABOUT THESE 
20110116164139.000|20110116164141.000|CC1|HOT BUTTON TOPICS LIKE GUNS.    
20110116164141.000|20110116164143.000|CC1|>> WELL, I THINK THAT'S RIGHT.  
20110116164143.000|20110116164145.000|CC1|I THINK THE CONGRESS SHOULD     
20110116164145.000|20110116164147.000|CC1|REDEDICATE ITSELF TO NOT ONLY   
20110116164147.000|20110116164148.000|CC1|CIVIL DISCOURSE, BUT TO WORKING 
20110116164148.000|20110116164148.000|CC1|TOGETHER AND GETTING THINGS     
20110116164148.000|20110116164149.000|CC1|DONE.                           
20110116164149.000|20110116164151.000|CC1|THERE ARE AREAS WHERE WE CAN    
20110116164151.000|20110116164152.000|CC1|REALLY MEET THE COUNTRY'S       
20110116164152.000|20110116164155.000|CC1|CHALLENGES IF WE PUT ASIDE      
20110116164155.000|20110116164157.000|CC1|ELECTIONEERING AND PARTISANSHIP,
20110116164157.000|20110116164200.000|CC1|LIKE DEFICIT REDUCTION, LIKE    
20110116164200.000|20110116164202.000|CC1|EDUCATION, NO CHILD LEFT BEHIND,
20110116164202.000|20110116164203.000|CC1|LIKE ENERGY.                    
20110116164203.000|20110116164204.000|CC1|WE NEED AN AMERICAN ENERGY      
20110116164204.000|20110116164205.000|CC1|INITIATIVE.                     
20110116164205.000|20110116164206.000|CC1|THOSE ARE THE THINGS WE CAN GET 
20110116164206.000|20110116164207.000|CC1|GOING.                          
20110116164207.000|20110116164209.000|CC1|WE OUGHT TO HAVE A LOGICAL      
20110116164209.000|20110116164209.000|CC1|DISCUSSION ABOUT THE TWO POINTS 
20110116164209.000|20110116164214.000|CC1|THAT THE MAYOR RAISED.          
20110116164214.000|20110116164214.000|CC1|ONE, HOW TO GET AN EARLY        
20110116164214.000|20110116164216.000|CC1|DETECTION SYSTEM WHERE WE CAN   
20110116164216.000|20110116164217.000|CC1|GET PEOPLE HELP, BUT ALSO GET   
20110116164217.000|20110116164220.000|CC1|THEM CLASSIFIED AS HAVING MENTAL
20110116164220.000|20110116164221.000|CC1|PROBLEMS SO THAT THEY ARE NO    
20110116164221.000|20110116164223.000|CC1|LONGER ELIGIBLE, UNDER THE BRADY
20110116164223.000|20110116164226.000|CC1|BILL, TO BUY FIREARMS.          
20110116164226.000|20110116164227.000|CC1|HAD THIS MAN BEEN CLASSIFIED,   
20110116164227.000|20110116164228.000|CC1|HAD HE BEEN COMMITTED CIVILLY AT
20110116164228.000|20110116164231.000|CC1|ANY TIME PRIOR TO HIS PURCHASING
20110116164231.000|20110116164232.000|CC1|THE GUN FROM WAL-MART, HE WOULD 
20110116164232.000|20110116164235.000|CC1|HAVE IN FACT BEEN DENIED ACCESS 
20110116164235.000|20110116164238.000|CC1|TO THAT FIREARM.                
20110116164238.000|20110116164239.000|CC1|BUT THEN, BOB, I ALSO THINK WE  
20110116164239.000|20110116164244.000|CC1|NEED A RATIONAL DISCUSSION ON   
20110116164244.000|20110116164245.000|CC1|GUNS, WHERE WE PUT ASIDE THE    
20110116164245.000|20110116164246.000|CC1|PRESSURE FROM INTEREST GROUPS.  
20110116164246.000|20110116164247.000|CC1|WE TAKE A LOOK AND SAY, DOES ANY
20110116164247.000|20110116164248.000|CC1|CITIZEN PROTECTING THEMSELVES OR
20110116164248.000|20110116164250.000|CC1|THEIR HOME OR USING A HANDGUN TO
20110116164250.000|20110116164251.000|CC1|HUNT, DO THEY NEED A CLIP THAT  
20110116164251.000|20110116164254.000|CC1|HAS 33 BULLETS IN IT?           
20110116164254.000|20110116164255.000|CC1|AND THE ANSWER IS, OF COURSE    
20110116164255.000|20110116164257.000|CC1|NOT.                            
20110116164257.000|20110116164258.000|CC1|THE CONGRESS, I THINK THE       
20110116164258.000|20110116164300.000|CC1|NATION'S SPIRITS WOULD BE LIFTED
20110116164300.000|20110116164301.000|CC1|IF THE CONGRESS ACTED QUICKLY   
20110116164301.000|20110116164302.000|CC1|WITH THE PRESIDENT AND          
20110116164302.000|20110116164303.000|CC1|REINSTATED THE ASSAULT WEAPONS  
20110116164303.000|20110116164305.000|CC1|BAN, WHICH ALSO HAD THE BAN ON  
20110116164305.000|20110116164307.000|CC1|THESE LARGE MAGAZINES, THESE    
20110116164307.000|20110116164308.000|CC1|CLIPS THAT CARRIED 30-PLUS

20110116164311.000|20110116164312.000|CC1|>> Schieffer: DO YOU AGREE WITH 
20110116164312.000|20110116164314.000|CC1|MR. GIULIANI IN THAT THE        
20110116164314.000|20110116164316.000|CC1|PRESIDENT'S SPEECH MAY HAVE     
20110116164316.000|20110116164316.000|CC1|ACTUALLY CHANGED THE DEBATE AND 
20110116164316.000|20110116164319.000|CC1|THE DISCOURSE?                  
20110116164319.000|20110116164320.000|CC1|>> WE'LL SEE.                   
20110116164320.000|20110116164321.000|CC1|I HOPE SO.                      
20110116164321.000|20110116164323.000|CC1|I THOUGHT THE PRESIDENT SOUNDED 
20110116164323.000|20110116164325.000|CC1|ALL THE RIGHT THEMES.           
20110116164325.000|20110116164326.000|CC1|I THINK IT WAS A GREAT SPEECH.  
20110116164326.000|20110116164328.000|CC1|I THINK HE PUT A LOT OF CARE    
20110116164328.000|20110116164329.000|CC1|INTO IT AND DIDN'T MAKE IT      
20110116164329.000|20110116164329.000|CC1|POLITICAL.                      
20110116164329.000|20110116164332.000|CC1|BUT WE'LL SEE.                  
20110116164332.000|20110116164332.000|CC1|REALLY, THE FIRST TEST IS ON    
20110116164332.000|20110116164335.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE.                    
20110116164335.000|20110116164336.000|CC1|CAN THE DEBATE ON HEALTH CARE,  
20110116164336.000|20110116164339.000|CC1|WHERE THE REPUBLICANS HAVE      
20110116164339.000|20110116164340.000|CC1|PROMISED TO REPEAL THE BILL,    
20110116164340.000|20110116164340.000|CC1|EVEN THOUGH THEY KNOW THAT      
20110116164340.000|20110116164346.000|CC1|THAT'S A FALSE PROMISE TO THE   
20110116164346.000|20110116164349.000|CC1|PEOPLE, BECAUSE IT'S NOT GOING  
20110116164349.000|20110116164350.000|CC1|TO PASS THE SENATE, THE         
20110116164350.000|20110116164351.000|CC1|PRESIDENT WOULD VETO IT.        
20110116164351.000|20110116164352.000|CC1|CAN THE REPUBLICANS HAVE        
20110116164352.000|20110116164352.000|CC1|DISCOURSE ON THAT, ALLOW        
20110116164352.000|20110116164353.000|CC1|AMENDMENTS, ALLOW DISCUSSION?   
20110116164353.000|20110116164354.000|CC1|AND MAYBE COME UP WITH THREE OR 
20110116164354.000|20110116164355.000|CC1|FOUR CHANGES RATHER THAN A      
20110116164355.000|20110116164357.000|CC1|REPEAL, WHICH NEVER IS GOING TO 
20110116164357.000|20110116164358.000|CC1|HAPPEN, AND BRING THOSE THREE OR
20110116164358.000|20110116164400.000|CC1|FOUR CHANGES TO THE PRESIDENT   
20110116164400.000|20110116164400.000|CC1|AND SAY, "MR. PRESIDENT, WILL   
20110116164400.000|20110116164403.000|CC1|YOU WORK WITH US AND TRY TO     
20110116164403.000|20110116164404.000|CC1|MODIFY THIS?"                   
20110116164404.000|20110116164404.000|CC1|THAT, TO ME, IS THE IMPORTANT   
20110116164404.000|20110116164405.000|CC1|THING.                          
20110116164405.000|20110116164406.000|CC1|NOT THAT EVERYBODY SITS TOGETHER
20110116164406.000|20110116164407.000|CC1|DURING THE STATE OF THE UNION.  
20110116164407.000|20110116164411.000|CC1|THAT WOULD BE A GREAT SYMBOL FOR
20110116164411.000|20110116164411.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY, BUT THAT'S NOT     
20110116164411.000|20110116164412.000|CC1|LONG-LASTING.                   
20110116164412.000|20110116164413.000|CC1|WE NEED TO SPEND THIS YEAR      
20110116164413.000|20110116164414.000|CC1|ADDRESSING THE NATION'S         
20110116164414.000|20110116164415.000|CC1|PROBLEMS, WHETHER IT'S HEALTH   
20110116164415.000|20110116164416.000|CC1|CARE, WHETHER IT'S EDUCATION,   
20110116164416.000|20110116164419.000|CC1|WHETHER IT'S ENERGY, WHETHER    
20110116164419.000|20110116164419.000|CC1|IT'S DEFICIT REDUCTION, WHETHER 
20110116164419.000|20110116164420.000|CC1|IT'S GUN CONTROL.

20110116164424.000|20110116164426.000|CC1|DEMONIZE EACH OTHER AND WHERE WE
20110116164426.000|20110116164429.000|CC1|LISTEN.                         
20110116164429.000|20110116164430.000|CC1|WHERE WE LISTEN!                
20110116164430.000|20110116164431.000|CC1|>> Schieffer: GOVERNOR, THIS IS 
20110116164431.000|20110116164432.000|CC1|SORT OF YOUR VALEDICTORY AS     
20110116164432.000|20110116164433.000|CC1|GOVERNOR ON SUNDAY TELEVISION.  
20110116164433.000|20110116164434.000|CC1|YOU LEAVE OFFICE ON TUESDAY.    
20110116164434.000|20110116164437.000|CC1|HOW HAS THE COUNTRY CHANGED     
20110116164437.000|20110116164438.000|CC1|SINCE YOU CAME TO OFFICE AND ARE
20110116164438.000|20110116164439.000|CC1|YOU... HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE
20110116164439.000|20110116164443.000|CC1|STATE OF THE NATION RIGHT NOW?  
20110116164443.000|20110116164446.000|CC1|>> WELL, I THINK, FIRST OF ALL, 
20110116164446.000|20110116164447.000|CC1|IN MY EIGHT YEARS, I'VE SEEN THE
20110116164447.000|20110116164447.000|CC1|LEVEL OF PARTISANSHIP AND       
20110116164447.000|20110116164448.000|CC1|IDEOLOGICAL POSTURING JUST      
20110116164448.000|20110116164451.000|CC1|INCREASE AND INCREASE AND       
20110116164451.000|20110116164452.000|CC1|INCREASE.                       
20110116164452.000|20110116164453.000|CC1|AND I THINK IT'S TEARING THE    
20110116164453.000|20110116164455.000|CC1|FABRIC OF OUR GOVERNMENT APART.

20110116164501.000|20110116164503.000|CC1|THIS IS A WAKE-UP CALL TO ALL OF
20110116164503.000|20110116164504.000|CC1|US, THAT WE CAN'T GO ON THE WAY 
20110116164504.000|20110116164505.000|CC1|WE'RE DOING.                    
20110116164505.000|20110116164508.000|CC1|WE JUST SIMPLY CAN'T DO THAT.   
20110116164508.000|20110116164509.000|CC1|IF THAT HAPPENS, THIS TRAGIC DAY
20110116164509.000|20110116164514.000|CC1|WILL HAVE DONE SOME REAL GOOD.  
20110116164514.000|20110116164516.000|CC1|SECONDLY, I HAVE FOUND THAT THE 
20110116164516.000|20110116164517.000|CC1|RECESSION HAS REALLY HARDENED   
20110116164517.000|20110116164518.000|CC1|PEOPLE'S ATTITUDES.             
20110116164518.000|20110116164520.000|CC1|WHAT'S IMPORTANT GOING FORWARD, 
20110116164520.000|20110116164522.000|CC1|IF I WERE TO GIVE A MESSAGE TO

20110116164950.000|20110116164951.000|CC1|WRITTEN, A LOT OF OUR SMALL     
20110116164951.000|20110116164954.000|CC1|BUSINESSES CAME TO ME AND SAID

20110116165003.000|20110116165004.000|CC1|WE CAN CHANGE THAT.

20110116165010.000|20110116165010.000|CC1|ALL AGREE ON?                   
20110116165010.000|20110116165011.000|CC1|I THINK IT IS.

20110116165023.000|20110116165023.000|CC1|PREVENTIVE CARE, WE CAN PROBABLY
20110116165023.000|20110116165025.000|CC1|KEEP THAT.

20110116165032.000|20110116165034.000|CC1|UNDERMINING OF OUR ABILITY TO BE
20110116165034.000|20110116165036.000|CC1|SUCCESSFUL IS VERY IMPORTANT.   
20110116165036.000|20110116165037.000|CC1|I THINK THE PRESIDENT'S CALL TO

20110116165114.000|20110116165116.000|CC1|>> WELL, I DON'T PLAN TO DEBATE 
20110116165116.000|20110116165117.000|CC1|MY VALUES AND THE PRINCIPLES OF 
20110116165117.000|20110116165122.000|CC1|MY CONSTITUENTS ANY LESS

20110116165124.000|20110116165125.000|CC1|BUT I THINK IT STARTS WITH US.  
20110116165125.000|20110116165126.000|CC1|I THINK WE HAVE TO BE MORE      
20110116165126.000|20110116165129.000|CC1|CAREFUL ABOUT THE WORDS WE      
20110116165129.000|20110116165130.000|CC1|CHOOSE, INCLUDING THINGS LIKE   
20110116165130.000|20110116165131.000|CC1|THE TITLE OF THE REPEAL OF THE  
20110116165131.000|20110116165132.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE REFORM.             
20110116165132.000|20110116165135.000|CC1|I'M GLAD THAT SPEAKER BOEHNER   
20110116165135.000|20110116165138.000|CC1|CHOSE TO VERBALIZE A DIFFERENT  
20110116165138.000|20110116165140.000|CC1|TITLE FOR THAT BILL, BUT THEY SO
20110116165140.000|20110116165142.000|CC1|FAR HAVE REFUSED TO ACTUALLY    
20110116165142.000|20110116165145.000|CC1|CHANGE THE TITLE OF "JOB KILLING
20110116165145.000|20110116165147.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE REPEAL."            
20110116165147.000|20110116165150.000|CC1|SO I THINK WE NEED TO BE LEADERS
20110116165150.000|20110116165151.000|CC1|BY EXAMPLE, AND WHEN WE DO THAT,
20110116165151.000|20110116165153.000|CC1|THEN HOPEFULLY WE'RE GOING TO BE
20110116165153.000|20110116165157.000|CC1|ABLE TO PUSH THE SHOCK JOCKS AND
20110116165157.000|20110116165158.000|CC1|OTHERS OUTSIDE OUR PROCESS, TO  
20110116165158.000|20110116165159.000|CC1|TAKE A PAGE FROM OUR BOOK AND IF
20110116165159.000|20110116165200.000|CC1|WE HAVE A MORE PRODUCTIVE CIVIL 
20110116165200.000|20110116165201.000|CC1|DISCOURSE, THEN WE CAN REALLY   
20110116165201.000|20110116165203.000|CC1|LIVE UP TO PRESIDENT OBAMA'S

20110116165211.000|20110116165212.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN FLAKE QUICKLY       
20110116165212.000|20110116165213.000|CC1|BECAUSE WE'RE RUNNING OUT OF    
20110116165213.000|20110116165215.000|CC1|TIME.                           
20110116165215.000|20110116165216.000|CC1|CONGRESSMAN, WHAT WILL BE THE   
20110116165216.000|20110116165219.000|CC1|HARDEST PART OF ALL THIS?       
20110116165219.000|20110116165222.000|CC1|>> WELL, I THINK KEEPING THIS

20110116165535.000|20110116165537.000|CC1|THAT LEE HARVEY OSWALD BOUGHT TO

20110116165543.000|20110116165545.000|CC1|PEOPLE LIKE JARED LOUGHNER.     
20110116165545.000|20110116165546.000|CC1|AND IT MADE ME AGAIN WONDER-- IS
20110116165546.000|20110116165547.000|CC1|THERE NOT SOME WAY THAT WE CAN  
20110116165547.000|20110116165548.000|CC1|CHANGE THAT?

20110116165551.000|20110116165552.000|CC1|AMERICANS WANT THE RIGHT TO OWN
